plugin.name: ðŸ§© Todoist Noteplan Sync
plugin.lastUpdateInfo: Updated to use latest version of Todoist API
plugin.description: Import and sync tasks between Todoist and Noteplan
plugin.author: dbludeau
plugin.requiredFiles-NOTE: If you want to use HTML windows, remove the '-EDIT_ME' ABOVE

plugin.commands.name: todoist sync everything
plugin.commands.description: Sync all tasks in Todoist to a Noteplan folder set in settings

plugin.commands.name: todoist sync today
plugin.commands.description: Sync Todoist tasks due today to the Noteplan daily note

plugin.commands.name: todoist sync project
plugin.commands.description: Sync Todoist project by name or from frontmatter
arguments: Project name(s) - comma-separated, or leave blank to use frontmatter
Date filter (today, overdue, current, 7 days, all) - optional

plugin.commands.name: todoist sync project by name
plugin.commands.description: Sync Todoist project(s) by name - prompts for project names and filter

plugin.commands.name: todoist sync project today
plugin.commands.description: Sync Todoist project - only tasks due today

plugin.commands.name: todoist sync project overdue
plugin.commands.description: Sync Todoist project - only overdue tasks

plugin.commands.name: todoist sync project current
plugin.commands.description: Sync Todoist project - overdue + today tasks

plugin.commands.name: todoist sync all linked projects
plugin.commands.description: Sync all Todoist projects (lists) to linked Noteplan notes using frontmatter

plugin.commands.name: todoist sync all linked projects and today
plugin.commands.description: Sync all linked projects as well as populate Todoist tasks due today to the today note. This command avoids duplicating tasks in the daily note

plugin.commands.name: todoist sync today by project
plugin.commands.description: Sync Todoist tasks due today (API semantics: only today, no overdue), organized by project

plugin.commands.name: todoist sync overdue by project
plugin.commands.description: Sync all overdue Todoist tasks, organized by project

plugin.commands.name: todoist sync current by project
plugin.commands.description: Sync current Todoist tasks (today + overdue), organized by project

plugin.commands.name: todoist sync week by project
plugin.commands.description: Sync all Todoist tasks due within 7 days, organized by project

plugin.commands.name: todoist convert to todoist task
plugin.commands.description: Convert selected non-Todoist tasks to Todoist tasks in the Inbox

plugin.commands.name: onMessageFromHTMLView
plugin.commands.description: dbludeau.TodoistNoteplanSync: Callback function to receive messages from HTML view

plugin.commands.name: Todoist Noteplan Sync: Update Plugin Settings

plugin.settings.COMMENT: This is for use by the editSettings helper function. PluginID must match the plugin.id in the top of this file

plugin.settings.title: Todoist API token
plugin.settings.description: API token for your Todoist account.  See https://todoist.com/help/articles/find-your-api-token for more information.

plugin.settings.title: Header to use for tasks without Todoist section
plugin.settings.description: Todoist tasks that are note part of a section will be written under this heading.  If you leave it blank, they will be prepended to the top of the note.

plugin.settings.title: Folder to use for syncing everything
plugin.settings.description: OPTIONAL. Folder where Todoist projects will sync to notes of same name when you run [/todoist sync everything].  If omitted, plugin will look for a folder named Todoist and create it if it does not exist

plugin.settings.title: Are you part of a Todoist Team account?
plugin.settings.description: FOR USERS OF TODOIST TEAMS PLANS ONLY.  Check this box if you use Todoist Teams accounts and tasks are assigned to you. Leave unchecked if you only use a personal Todoist account.

plugin.settings.title: Sync unassigned tasks
plugin.settings.description: By default the sync will pull only tasks assigned to you.  If you want to sync all unassigned tasks as well, check this box.

plugin.settings.title: Date filter for project syncs
plugin.settings.description: Filter which tasks are synced based on due date. Choose 'all' to sync everything.

plugin.settings.title: Separator between multiple projects
plugin.settings.description: How to visually separate tasks from different Todoist projects when using multiple projects per note (with todoist_ids frontmatter).

plugin.settings.title: Insert before project title
plugin.settings.description: What to insert before each project title/separator.

plugin.settings.title: Section heading format
plugin.settings.description: How to format Todoist section headings within multi-project notes.

plugin.settings.title: Insert before section heading
plugin.settings.description: What to insert before each section heading.

plugin.settings.NOTE: DO NOT CHANGE THE FOLLOWING SETTINGS; ADD YOUR SETTINGS ABOVE ^^^

plugin.settings.title: Log Level
plugin.settings.description:
Set how much logging output will be displayed when executing Todoist Noteplan Sync commands in NotePlan Plugin Console Logs (NotePlan -> Help -> Plugin Console)

 - DEBUG: Show All Logs
 - INFO: Only Show Info, Warnings, and Errors
 - WARN: Only Show Errors or Warnings
 - ERROR: Only Show Errors
 - none: Don't show any logs
